dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers Sony maccar.com 1824
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Jayme [mailto:jayme@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, May 17, 2006 1:37 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers Sony maccar.com 1824
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers Sony maccar.com 1824



 

To Whom It May Concern:

Thank you for removing all of SONY Mobile logos and copyrighted images
from the urls provided, but in order to comply fully all of the
copyrighted images and/or trademarked logos of SONY Mobile needs to be
removed from your entire website. This case will remain open until this
request is satisfied in full.  If you should need any further assistance
in reaching compliance please let me know and I will do my best to
provide you with the needed information.  Below are the two specific
URLs which contain all of the images that need to be removed

http://www.maccar.com/products.php?viewCat=56&CatagoryAction=1
<http://www.maccar.com/products.php?viewCat=56&CatagoryAction=1> 

 

http://www.maccar.com/products.php?PageNo=2&viewCat=56&keyword=&Brand=&M
odel=&Year=&Price=&CatagoryAction=1&BrandAction=&YearAction=&PriceAction
=&ModelAction=&manufactured=&year=&model=&PartNo=&search_form=&class
<http://www.maccar.com/products.php?PageNo=2&viewCat=56&keyword=&Brand=&
Model=&Year=&Price=&CatagoryAction=1&BrandAction=&YearAction=&PriceActio
n=&ModelAction=&manufactured=&year=&model=&PartNo=&search_form=&class> =

 

 

Thanks in advance for your attention to this matter, 

 

Jayme W.

LMS Associate

Net Enforcers, Inc. 

Jayme@netenforcers.com <mailto:Jayme@netenforcers.com> 

Compliance.management@netenforcers.com
<mailto:Compliance.management@netenforcers.com> 

 

 

 

 

-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]

Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2006 4:07 PM
To: compliance.management@netenforcers.com; misha@netenforcers.com;
copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from NetEnforcers Sony maccar.com 1824

 

To Whom It May Concern:

 

 

 

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.

 

 

 

Legal Response Team

 

The Planet

 

 

 

 

---------

 

 

Please see attached.
